title: Who wins the U.S.-Canada rematch? Goalie confidence, X factors, keys to victory
description: Team USA won the first matchup 3-1. Will Canada get its revenge? Or will the hosts make it a clean sweep in Boston on Thursday?
author: Ryan Clark and Kristen Shilton

title: Sources: Cowboys All-Pro guard Martin retiring
description: Zack Martin, one of the most decorated offensive linemen in Dallas Cowboys history, informed the team he plans to retire.
author: Todd Archer

title: Price wins Premier League night three in Dublin
description: Gerwyn Price wins his first Premier League night since 2023 with victory over Nathan Aspinall in Dublin.

title: World champion Dubois out of Parker fight with illness
description: Heavyweight Daniel Dubois' world title defence against Joseph Parker on Saturday is in doubt with reports that the champion is ill.

title: Follow live: Team USA, Canada set for epic rematch as rivals fight to the finish
description: The Americans won 3-1 when the two teams met in round-robin play. Tonight, the 4 Nations Face-Off title is on the line â€” and nothing will be held back.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: MLB debuts robot ump challenge system at Dodgers-Cubs spring training opener
description: The Cubs went 1-for-2 on challenges in their first game with the system.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Man given restraining order after approaching Raducanu before match
description: A man has been given a restraining order after approaching Emma Raducanu with 'fixated behaviour' before her match in Dubai.

title: Price beats Littler and Humphries on way to impressive Dublin victory
description: Gerwyn Price claimed his first Premier League title of the season after seeing off Luke Littler and Luke Humphries on his way to a Night Three final victory over Nathan Aspinall in Dublin.
